item.title: What is the new Visual Studio Code Remote feature and how to use it
item.description: Visual Studio Code just launched one of the most interesting features ever in a code editor: the option to install it on a server and access all your files remotely, using all your plugins and tools from your normal editor. I’ve already used it to edit some configuration and environment files on a couple servers and the experiences is awesome. In this post, I’ll explain how to install it using SSH and why it is convenient.
